behaviors.name: core_spawn_saturation
behaviors.description: Core spawn saturation: Maintains all spawns at 85-100% capacity. Routes all available workers below threshold to transfer energy to spawns. Prioritizes empty/critical spawns (6, 2, 3). Simple, focused, unified strategy.

behaviors.name: spawn_saturation_unified
behaviors.description: Unified spawn saturation: Routes all available workers with energy to critical spawns (6, 2, 3) first, then to any spawn below 100%. Ensures no spawn remains idle. Works with focus_harvest directive.

behaviors.name: unified_spawn_fill
behaviors.description: Unified spawn fill v1: Routes all workers with energy ≥70% threshold to the lowest-energy spawn first. Ensures all spawns maintain 800+ energy for continuous production. Simple, non-overlapping, permanent.

behaviors.name: spawn_saturation_v2_clean
behaviors.description: Clean spawn saturation: Routes all workers with sufficient energy to critical/empty spawns first, then fills remaining spawns. Single unified behavior to replace directive chaos.
